Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is indeed worth $10,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This exclusive offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
